INTRODUCTION.TITLE: Hi, I'm Bruno Ortuño!
INTRODUCTION.SUBTITLE: Fullstack Web Developer

EDUCATIONS.name: Technical Degree in Systems Analysis
EDUCATIONS.description: Knowledge in algorithm design, requirements analysis, UML, and systems administration.

EDUCATIONS.name: Backend Programming in Java
EDUCATIONS.description: Implementation of stateless APIs with Java Spring Boot and MySQL. Use of JWT for authentication and Spring Data for persistence.

EDUCATIONS.name: Bachelor's Degree in Physics
EDUCATIONS.place: Universidad Nacional de Mar del Plata
EDUCATIONS.description: I pursued a degree in Physics from 2017 to 2019. During this time, I acquired knowledge in general physics, mechanical physics, linear algebra, calculus, earth sciences, and research methodology.

EDUCATIONS.name: Bachelor's Degree in Psychology
EDUCATIONS.place: Universidad Nacional de Mar del Plata
EDUCATIONS.description: I studied a degree in Psychology from 2012 to 2015, developing various knowledge areas such as Psychology, Epistemology, Research Methodology, Philosophy, Social History, Sociology, and the analysis of group and interpersonal dynamics.

EDUCATIONS.name: Fullstack Development with Java
EDUCATIONS.description: Fullstack development course with Java implementing SpringBoot, MySQL, and frontend technologies such as JavaScript, HTML5, CSS, and Bootstrap.

EDUCATIONS.name: Fullstack JavaScript Developer
EDUCATIONS.description: Development of applications with Node.js, React.js, and Next.js. Use of tools such as Tailwind CSS, Prisma, and Bootstrap.

EDUCATIONS.name: Programmer
EDUCATIONS.description: Annual training course in Programming. Topics included backend for desktop applications, web, and games as well as frontend web development.

EDUCATIONS.name: Database Administrator
EDUCATIONS.description: Management of relational and non-relational databases. Focus on SQL applied to functional projects with MySQL.

EDUCATIONS.name: Advanced Python Programming for Data Science
EDUCATIONS.description: Data analysis with NumPy and Pandas, integrated with MySQL for persistence.

EDUCATIONS.name: Python Programming
EDUCATIONS.description: Python programming course focused on algorithm development and data handling.

EDUCATIONS.name: Java Programming
EDUCATIONS.description: Java programming course focused on understanding data structures, algorithms, object-oriented programming, and graphical interface development using Java Swing.

EDUCATIONS.name: Data Science in Python
EDUCATIONS.description: Data analysis course in Python using Pandas and Numpy libraries, along with a brief introduction to Machine Learning.

EDUCATIONS.name: Frontend Development
EDUCATIONS.description: Frontend development course focused on creating a portfolio webpage using HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and Bootstrap.

EDUCATIONS.name: Introduction to JavaScript and Ruby
EDUCATIONS.description: Introductory course on the use of JavaScript and Ruby.
